TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PackageItemInfo extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Base class containing information common to all package items held by the package manager.

remarks.para: Base class containing information common to all package items held by the package manager. This provides a very common basic set of attributes: a label, icon, and meta-data. This class is not intended to be used by itself; it is simply here to share common definitions between all items returned by the package manager. As such, it does not itself implement Parcelable, but does provide convenience methods to assist in the implementation of Parcelable in subclasses.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: A PackageManager from which the banner can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Docs.summary: Retrieve the current graphical banner associated with this item.
Docs.returns: Returns a Drawable containing the item's banner. If the item does not have a banner, this method will return null.

remarks.para: Retrieve the current graphical banner associated with this item. This will call back on the given PackageManager to load the banner from the application.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

abstract member LoadXmlMetaData : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager * string -> System.Xml.XmlReader override this.LoadXmlMetaData : Android.Content.PM.PackageManager * string -> System.Xml.XmlReader

Docs.param: A PackageManager from which the XML can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Name of the meta-date you would like to load.
Docs.summary: Load an XML resource attached to the meta-data of this item.
Docs.returns: Returns an XmlPullParser you can use to parse the XML file assigned as the given meta-data. If the meta-data name is not defined or the XML resource could not be found, null is returned.

remarks.para: Load an XML resource attached to the meta-data of this item. This will retrieved the name meta-data entry, and if defined call back on the given PackageManager to load its XML file from the application.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

member this.Logo : int with get, set

Docs.summary: A drawable resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this component's logo.

remarks.para: A drawable resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this component's logo. Logos may be larger/wider than icons and are displayed by certain UI elements in place of a name or name/icon combination. From the "logo" attribute or, if not set, 0.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
